channel.title: Screen Bug on TestScape or on my computer?
channel.description:
Often when i log on after have added a code on my server my loading please wait screen frozes....but not my text....My compile is saying this: [code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966[/code] And the ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966 should not be there Coz this is before i log in....and the number 4966 varies to other numbers too My compile is saying this after i have logged in: [code]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4967 Client type: high memory version UserId: 42946342 owner pd has signed onto server. [/code]
[glow=blue,2,300]Help Please[/glow]
[glow=purple,2,300]Download the file under to see how the bug looks like[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:19:13 PM[/size][hr][glow=green,2,300]Help me please :)[/glow]

item.title: Screen Bug on TestScape or on my computer?

ok i changed port and it helped me =)

item.title: Screen Bug on TestScape or on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jekkyl Dr Jekkyl
item.description:
@Dr_Jekkyl wrote:

happens to me ALL the time. often i find just recompiling 3-4 times and closing and then reopened the moparscape window 3-4 times fixes it. if not just delete all the files to do with ur char, annoying but it always works.

item.title: Screen Bug on TestScape or on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Often when i log on after have added a code on my server my loading please wait screen frozes…but not my text…My compile is saying this:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966
And the ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966 should not be there
Coz this is before i log in…and the number 4966 varies to other numbers too
My compile is saying this after i have logged in:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4966 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:4967 Client type: high memory version UserId: 42946342 owner pd has signed onto server.

[glow=blue,2,300]Help Please[/glow]

[glow=purple,2,300]Download the file under to see how the bug looks like[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 06:19:13 PM[/size][hr][glow=green,2,300]Help me please :)[/glow]

Read full topic
